info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 6:59PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Showers with gusty winds will impact portions of northeastern Pondera, Liberty, Toole and northwestern Hill Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 657 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 23 miles east of Sunburst to Shelby to 6 miles northwest of Conrad. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shelby, Chester, Sunburst, Kevin, Inverness, Lothair, Joplin, Ethridge, Oilmont, Rudyard, Ledger, Tiber Dam, Galata, Whitlash, Ferdig, Devon, Dunkirk and Simpson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A few lightning strikes may occur with this activity. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
